title: raamaa raamaa raamaa sithA
sahitya:
rAma rAma rAma sItA ramaNa pApa haraNa

caraNam 1

 centarAka uNDu celimi niNDU kalimi
   
caraNam 2

 mana mEcEdamanucu inta madamA kAmadamA
   
caraNam 3

 nanu vinA gati evvaraunucu negavO lEka biguvO
   
caraNam 4

 shashimukha nannEcunnadi yashamA nADu vashamA
   
caraNam 5

 karuNa jUtunanucu balka karuvA brOva baruvA
   
caraNam 6

 rAmayani moraliDa madi rAdA dEvarAya
   
caraNam 7

 inni vinnapamulanuku madi inumA mATa vinumA
   
caraNam 8

 lEmi delpa pedda levaru lEra nIdu pOrA
   
caraNam 9

 uNDinAnu ninnu bOli undurE ADukondurE
  
caraNam 10

 bhaLi bhaLi tana karma menta balamO lEka calamO
 
caraNam 11

 valaci pADi inta balkavalenA tALa galanA
 
caraNam 12

 ila rakSaNa sEyalEni kulamA vyAkulamA
 
caraNam 13

 vashamu gAdu tyAgarAja varada kundasurada
